test-set.name: expath-binary
test-set.description: Tests for the extension functions in the EXPath "binary" package. Note the tests are written on the assumption that the "working directory" for resolving relative filenames is the directory containing this test catalog file.

test-case.name: binary-length-001
test-case.description: Use length on an empty value

test-case.name: binary-length-002
test-case.description: Use length on an quadruple octet value

test-case.name: binary-from-octets-001
test-case.description: Generate a zero-length binary from an empty set of octets

test-case.name: binary-from-octets-002
test-case.description: Generate a 4-length binary from a triple of octets

test-case.name: binary-from-octets-003
test-case.description: Negative integer outside octet range in binary construction

test-case.name: binary-from-octets-004
test-case.description: Positive integer outside octet range in binary construction

test-case.name: binary-hex-001
test-case.description: Generate a zero-length binary from an empty hex string

test-case.name: binary-hex-002
test-case.description: hex - Generate an empty sequence from an empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-hex-003
test-case.description: Generate a binary from a two-multiple hex string

test-case.name: binary-hex-004
test-case.description: Generate a binary from a non-two-multiple hex string

test-case.name: binary-bin-001
test-case.description: Generate a zero-length binary from an empty binary string

test-case.name: binary-bin-002
test-case.description: Generate an empty sequence from an empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-bin-003
test-case.description: Generate a binary from an eight-multiple binary string

test-case.name: binary-bin-004
test-case.description: Generate a binary from a non-eight-multiple binary string

test-case.name: binary-octal-001
test-case.description: Generate a zero-length binary from an empty octal string

test-case.name: binary-octal-002
test-case.description: octal - Generate an empty sequence from an empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-octal-003
test-case.description: Generate a binary from byte-aligned octal string

test-case.name: binary-octal-004
test-case.description: Generate a binary from a non-byte-aligned string

test-case.name: binary-part-004
test-case.description: Part: offset just at end of input

test-case.name: binary-part-005
test-case.description: Part: offset beyond end of input

test-case.name: binary-part-006
test-case.description: Part: end beyond end of input

test-case.name: binary-insert-before-003
test-case.description: Insert-before: offset beyond end of input

test-case.name: binary-insert-before-005
test-case.description: Insert-before of two sequences with zero offset

test-case.name: binary-pad-left-001
test-case.description: Pad left on an empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-pad-left-008
test-case.description: Pad-left by 1 octet with non-zero padding

test-case.name: binary-pad-right-001
test-case.description: Pad right on an empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-pad-right-008
test-case.description: Pad-right by 1 octet with non-zero padding

test-case.name: binary-find-002
test-case.description: find with an empty search sequence

test-case.name: binary-find-005
test-case.description: find with search sequence absent from target

test-case.name: binary-encode-string-004
test-case.description: encode-string on a non-empty string, converted to octets

test-case.name: binary-encode-string-005
test-case.description: encode-string on a non-empty string - UTF-16 - no control over BOM

test-case.name: binary-encode-string-006
test-case.description: encode-string on a non-empty string - UTF-16 - no control over BOM

test-case.name: binary-encode-string-007
test-case.description: encode-string on a non-empty string using default encoding

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-006
test-case.description: decode-string on non-empty binary data, converted from octets

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-012
test-case.description: decode-string with code phasing mismatch in UTF-8

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-013
test-case.description: decode-string on non-empty binary data in UTF-16

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-014
test-case.description: decode-string on non-empty binary data in UTF-16 with big-endian BOM

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-015
test-case.description: decode-string on non-empty binary data in UTF-16 with little endian BOM

test-case.name: binary-decode-string-016
test-case.description: decode-string on non-empty binary data with default encoding

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-002
test-case.description: pack-integer octet-order comparison - most significant synonyms
test-case.test: for $b in bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'most-significant-first') return $b eq bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'big-endian') and $b eq bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'BE')

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-003
test-case.description: pack-integer octet-order comparison - least significant synonyms
test-case.test: for $b in bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'least-significant-first') return $b eq bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'little-endian') and $b eq bin:pack-integer(34567,3,'LE')

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-004
test-case.description: pack-integer octet-order comparison - least and most differ

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-010
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as short - default - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-011
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as short - little-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-012
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as short - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-013
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as short - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-014
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as short - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-017
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as int - little-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-018
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as int - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-019
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as long - little-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-020
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as long - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-integer-021
test-case.description: pack-integer with non-zero as BIG - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-pack-double-003
test-case.description: pack-double with +0.0 - big-endian. Note the difference from IEEE regarding no negative zero - in that case the leading octet is 128

test-case.name: binary-pack-double-004
test-case.description: pack-double with -0.0 - big-endian. Note the difference from IEEE regarding no negative zero - in that case the leading octet is 128

test-case.name: binary-pack-double-011
test-case.description: pack-double with NaN - big-endian. Possibilities of other NaN values?

test-case.name: binary-pack-float-003
test-case.description: pack-float with +0.0 - big-endian. Note the difference from IEEE regarding no negative zero - in that case the leading octet is 128

test-case.name: binary-pack-float-004
test-case.description: pack-float with -0.0 - big-endian. Note the difference from IEEE regarding no negative zero - in that case the leading octet is 128

test-case.name: binary-pack-float-010
test-case.description: pack-float with NaN - big-endian. Possibilities of other NaN values?

test-case.name: binary-unpack-double-007
test-case.description: unpack-double with NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-double-008
test-case.description: unpack-double with quiet NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-double-009
test-case.description: unpack-double with signalling NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-float-007
test-case.description: unpack-float with NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-float-008
test-case.description: unpack-float with quiet NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-float-009
test-case.description: unpack-float with signalling NaN with payload - big-endian

test-case.name: binary-unpack-unsigned-integer-002
test-case.description: unpack-unsigned-integer octet-order comparison - most significant synonyms

test-case.name: binary-unpack-unsigned-integer-003
test-case.description: unpack-unsigned-integer octet-order comparison - least significant synonyms

test-case.name: binary-unpack-unsigned-integer-004
test-case.description: unpack-unsigned-integer octet-order comparison - least and most differ

test-case.name: binary-unpack-integer-002
test-case.description: unpack-integer octet-order comparison - most significant synonyms

test-case.name: binary-unpack-integer-003
test-case.description: unpack-integer octet-order comparison - least significant synonyms

test-case.name: binary-unpack-integer-004
test-case.description: unpack-integer octet-order comparison - least and most differ

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-or-003
test-case.description: bitwise-or with data and empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-or-004
test-case.description: bitwise-or with empty sequence and data

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-and-003
test-case.description: bitwise-and with data and empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-and-004
test-case.description: bitwise-and with empty sequence and data

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-xor-003
test-case.description: bitwise-xor with data and empty sequence

test-case.name: binary-bitwise-xor-004
test-case.description: bitwise-xor with empty sequence and data
